cards.title: Third Degree
cards.description: Third Degree is a show where Aaj Tak reporters interrogate people posing serious questions highlighting some of the major issues that are of concern to the nation. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: Al Jazeera News
cards.description: Al Jazeera, also known as JSC, is a state-funded broadcaster in Doha, Qatar, owned by the Al Jazeera Media Network. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: Arirang News- Foreign Correspondents
cards.description: Arirang TV is a global, English-language television network based in Seoul, South Korea. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: Buletin Awani 7:45
cards.description: Astro Awani is the in-house rolling television news and current affairs channel providing 24-hour news coverage including news in Malay. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: Euronews- Raw Politics
cards.description: Euronews is a multilingual news media service, headquartered in Lyon, France. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: KBS News 9
cards.description: KBS Nine O'Clock News is the flagship newscast that airs on KBS1 every night at 9:00pm KST. [TV SHOW] [NEWS]

cards.title: 2018 All England Open
cards.description: The 2018 All England Open, officially YONEX All England Open 2018 was a badminton tournament which took place at Arena Birmingham in England from 14 to 18 March 2018 and had a total purse of $1,000,000. [TV SHOW] [SPORTS]

cards.title: 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup Qualifiers
cards.description: Process to determine the teams that will participate at the 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup. [TV SHOW] [SPORTS]

cards.title: Cricket Ki Baat
cards.description: Cricket Ki Baat is a show that brings you the inside stories from the dressing room of cricket teams to BCCI politics; from to exclusive interviews with iconic cricket stars to lots of live action and match analysis. [TV SHOW] [SPORTS]

cards.title: Asian Netball Championships 2018
cards.description: The Asian Netball Championship is a netball competition held every two years with teams from across Asia competing. [TV SHOW] [SPORTS]

cards.title: Best Shot
cards.description: 'Best Shot,' a documentary series co-produced by Lebron James about an inner city basketball team, is available on the NBA YouTube channel. [TV SHOW] [SPORTS]

cards.title: Chelsea Films
cards.description: Get to know Chelsea like no one ever did before. [TV SHOW] [SPORTS]
